concept: MCQs on aggregate functions and grouping.

challenges.title: Q1: Aggregate Function
challenges.description: Which of the following is NOT an aggregate function in SQL?
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) COUNT
b) SUM
c) AVG
d) WHERE
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d

challenges.title: Q2: GROUP BY Usage
challenges.description: GROUP BY clause is used in SQL to:
challenges.inputDescription: No input. This is an MCQ.
examples:
Options:
a) Filter rows before selection
b) Group rows that have the same values in specified columns
c) Sort rows in ascending order
d) Remove duplicate rows
challenges.starterCode: // Mark your answer: a / b / c / d
